trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Swarm of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the swarm is at half of its hit points or fewer, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.
